\chapter{Spockbots API}
\label{\detokenize{index:spockbots-api}}

\section{Menu}
\label{\detokenize{0_menu:menu}}\label{\detokenize{0_menu::doc}}
We named it \sphinxtitleref{0\_menu.py} so it shows up on the top in the brick program:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
     \PYG{n}{Crane}
\PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}\PYGZgt{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}}  \PYG{n}{Swing}
     \PYG{n}{Calibrate}
     \PYG{o}{.}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{o}{.}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

Displays a menu in which we muve with the UP DOWN keys up and down. We leave with the left
key and select a program with the right key.

\subsection{run.check}
\label{\detokenize{run:module-run.check}}\label{\detokenize{run:run-check}}\index{run.check (module)@\spxentry{run.check}\spxextra{module}}\index{run\_check() (in module run.check)@\spxentry{run\_check()}\spxextra{in module run.check}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{run:run.check.run_check}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{run.check.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{run\_check}}}{}{}
Checks the robot by driving the large and medium motors and flashing the color sensors

Order:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Large Motor left

\item {} 
Large Motor left

\item {} 
Medium Motor left

\item {} 
Medium Motor left

\item {} 
Color Sensor left

\item {} 
Color Sensor right

\item {} 
Color Sensor back

\end{itemize}

\end{fulllineitems}

\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{port}} \textendash{} The port 1,2,3,4

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{white}} \textendash{} The value to stop

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
